Row.Text: Welcome, my friend! This is the great Sultanate of Zanzibar, and I am its great Sultan. I very much hope you're here to trade.
What did you want? Gold? Spices? There were far, far easier ways to get your hands on them.
Our people are now eating your cloves and taking your slaves. I really do worry the rest of the world will succumb to the influence of your culture.
